title: Sports Mktg Coord., US Sports Football Grassroots - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sports Mktg Coord., US Sports Football Grassroots Sports Equipment Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Manage relationships with professional a, college and grassroots football partners while providing superior customer service. Travel up to 40% of time to service our promotional partners. Peak season travel from May through January.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
